Name: Model of a Sailing Boat With Large Canopy
Description: The model boat has a large canopy and a deck at the stern. The bow has now split open due to the wood drying out. The wooden frame of the canopy extends along the sides of the boat. Miniatures of actual boats that sailed on the Nile, through the Delta marshes, or along the canals, were placed in the tomb for travel in the afterlife.
